      // Expose identity for interwikiFrame
      window.isStyleFrame = true;

      // Find interwikiFrames in the parent that have initialised before
      // this styleFrame did, and push the query parameters to it
      Array.prototype.slice.call(parent).forEach(function (frame) {
        try {
          if (frame.isInterwikiFrame) {
            frame.requestStyleChange(location.search);
          }
        } catch (error) {
          // If an interwikiFrame in the parent isn't ready to receive a style
          // change request, that's fine - it will pull the style from this
          // styleFrame when it's ready
          if (!(error instanceof DOMException)) {
            // All other errors must be reported
            throw error;
          }
        }

旧作









What this is
A bunch of miscellaneous CSS 'improvements' that I, Croquembouche, use on a bunch of pages because I think it makes them easier to deal with.
The changes this component makes are bunch of really trivial modifications to ease the writing experience and to make documenting components/themes a bit easier (which I do a lot). It doesn't change anything about the page visually for the reader — the changes are for the writer.
I wouldn't expect translations of articles that use this component to also use this component, unless the translator likes it and would want to use it anyway.
This component probably won't conflict with other components or themes, and even if it does, it probably won't matter too much.
Usage
On any wiki:

This component is designed to be used on other components. When using on another component, be sure to add this inside the component's [[iftags]] block, so that users of your component are not forced into also using Croqstyle.
Related components
Other personal styling components (which change just a couple things):

RSO Component — Rounderhouse

Personal styling themes (which are visual overhauls):

Magnus Web Format — DrMagnus
Flopstyle CSS — Lt Flops
Blankstyle CSS — HarryBlank
Placestyle CSS — Placeholder McD
Jakstyle — JakdragonX


CSS changes
Reasonably-sized footnotes
Stops footnotes from being a million miles wide, so that you can actually read them.

Monospace edit/code
Makes the edit textbox monospace, and also changes all monospace text to Fira Code, the obviously superior monospace font.

Teletype backgrounds
Adds a light grey background to <tt> elements ({{text}}), so code snippets stand out more.

No more bigfaces
Stops big pictures from appearing when you hover over someone's avatar image, because they're stupid and really annoying and you can just click on them if you want to see the big version.

Breaky breaky
Any text inside a div with class nobreak has line-wrapping happen between every letter.

Code colours
Add my terminal's code colours as variables. Maybe I'll change this to a more common terminal theme like Monokai or something at some point, but for now it's just my personal theme, which is derived from Tomorrow Night Eighties.
Also, adding the .terminal class to a fake code block as [[div class="code terminal"]] gives it a sort of pseudo-terminal look with a dark background. Doesn't work with [[code]], because Wikidot inserts a bunch of syntax highlighting that you can't change yourself without a bunch of CSS. Use it for non-[[code]] code snippets only.
Quick tool to colourise a 'standard' Wikidot component usage example with the above vars: link


Debug mode
Draw lines around anything inside .debug-mode. The colour of the lines is red but defers to CSS variable --debug-colour.
You can also add div.debug-info.over and div.debug-info.under inside an element to annotate the debug boxes — though you'll need to make sure to leave enough vertical space that the annotation doesn't overlap the thing above or below it.

[…] 行动：目击由五角大楼/北美全球超自然然联盟长期联合发起，致力于平息“面纱协议”2021年全球大崩溃。在这一行动的指导下，一系列社会活动纷至沓来，旨在将美国公众引向一个怪异——且有几份骇人的——新世界。
为了在与先锋会的“舆论之战”中大获全胜，它陆续在全美各地散播一系列教育宣传材料——甚至是其他国家——以期取得足够的社会认可。其中部分及相关资料摘录如下。 […]
— 节选自“行动：目击公开材料”，作者Alice Sharp，发表于揭开面纱杂志(2049)

约稿

旧作









What this is
A bunch of miscellaneous CSS 'improvements' that I, Croquembouche, use on a bunch of pages because I think it makes them easier to deal with.
The changes this component makes are bunch of really trivial modifications to ease the writing experience and to make documenting components/themes a bit easier (which I do a lot). It doesn't change anything about the page visually for the reader — the changes are for the writer.
I wouldn't expect translations of articles that use this component to also use this component, unless the translator likes it and would want to use it anyway.
This component probably won't conflict with other components or themes, and even if it does, it probably won't matter too much.
Usage
On any wiki:

This component is designed to be used on other components. When using on another component, be sure to add this inside the component's [[iftags]] block, so that users of your component are not forced into also using Croqstyle.
Related components
Other personal styling components (which change just a couple things):

RSO Component — Rounderhouse

Personal styling themes (which are visual overhauls):

Magnus Web Format — DrMagnus
Flopstyle CSS — Lt Flops
Blankstyle CSS — HarryBlank
Placestyle CSS — Placeholder McD
Jakstyle — JakdragonX


CSS changes
Reasonably-sized footnotes
Stops footnotes from being a million miles wide, so that you can actually read them.

Monospace edit/code
Makes the edit textbox monospace, and also changes all monospace text to Fira Code, the obviously superior monospace font.

Teletype backgrounds
Adds a light grey background to <tt> elements ({{text}}), so code snippets stand out more.

No more bigfaces
Stops big pictures from appearing when you hover over someone's avatar image, because they're stupid and really annoying and you can just click on them if you want to see the big version.

Breaky breaky
Any text inside a div with class nobreak has line-wrapping happen between every letter.

Code colours
Add my terminal's code colours as variables. Maybe I'll change this to a more common terminal theme like Monokai or something at some point, but for now it's just my personal theme, which is derived from Tomorrow Night Eighties.
Also, adding the .terminal class to a fake code block as [[div class="code terminal"]] gives it a sort of pseudo-terminal look with a dark background. Doesn't work with [[code]], because Wikidot inserts a bunch of syntax highlighting that you can't change yourself without a bunch of CSS. Use it for non-[[code]] code snippets only.
Quick tool to colourise a 'standard' Wikidot component usage example with the above vars: link


Debug mode
Draw lines around anything inside .debug-mode. The colour of the lines is red but defers to CSS variable --debug-colour.
You can also add div.debug-info.over and div.debug-info.under inside an element to annotate the debug boxes — though you'll need to make sure to leave enough vertical space that the annotation doesn't overlap the thing above or below it.

[[/=]]","textContent":"What this is
A bunch of miscellaneous CSS 'improvements' that I, Croquembouche, use on a bunch of pages because I think it makes them easier to deal with.
The changes this component makes are bunch of really trivial modifications to ease the writing experience and to make documenting components/themes a bit easier (which I do a lot). It doesn't change anything about the page visually for the reader — the changes are for the writer.
I wouldn't expect translations of articles that use this component to also use this component, unless the translator likes it and would want to use it anyway.
This component probably won't conflict with other components or themes, and even if it does, it probably won't matter too much.
Usage
On any wiki:

This component is designed to be used on other components. When using on another component, be sure to add this inside the component's [[iftags]] block, so that users of your component are not forced into also using Croqstyle.
Related components
Other personal styling components (which change just a couple things):

RSO Component — Rounderhouse

Personal styling themes (which are visual overhauls):

Magnus Web Format — DrMagnus
Flopstyle CSS — Lt Flops
Blankstyle CSS — HarryBlank
Placestyle CSS — Placeholder McD
Jakstyle — JakdragonX


CSS changes
Reasonably-sized footnotes
Stops footnotes from being a million miles wide, so that you can actually read them.

Monospace edit/code
Makes the edit textbox monospace, and also changes all monospace text to Fira Code, the obviously superior monospace font.

Teletype backgrounds
Adds a light grey background to <tt> elements ({{text}}), so code snippets stand out more.

No more bigfaces
Stops big pictures from appearing when you hover over someone's avatar image, because they're stupid and really annoying and you can just click on them if you want to see the big version.

Breaky breaky
Any text inside a div with class nobreak has line-wrapping happen between every letter.

Code colours
Add my terminal's code colours as variables. Maybe I'll change this to a more common terminal theme like Monokai or something at some point, but for now it's just my personal theme, which is derived from Tomorrow Night Eighties.
Also, adding the .terminal class to a fake code block as [[div class="code terminal"]] gives it a sort of pseudo-terminal look with a dark background. Doesn't work with [[code]], because Wikidot inserts a bunch of syntax highlighting that you can't change yourself without a bunch of CSS. Use it for non-[[code]] code snippets only.
Quick tool to colourise a 'standard' Wikidot component usage example with the above vars: link


Debug mode
Draw lines around anything inside .debug-mode. The colour of the lines is red but defers to CSS variable --debug-colour.
You can also add div.debug-info.over and div.debug-info.under inside an element to annotate the debug boxes — though you'll need to make sure to leave enough vertical space that the annotation doesn't overlap the thing above or below it.

…like this!

> [...] **行动：目击**由五角大楼/北美全球超自然然联盟长期联合发起，致力于平息[[[from-120-s-archives-hub|“面纱协议”]]][[[no-return-hub|2021年全球大崩溃]]]。在这一行动的指导下，一系列社会活动纷至沓来，旨在将美国公众引向一个怪异——且有几份骇人的——新世界。
> 
> 为了在与先锋会的“舆论之战”中大获全胜，它陆续在全美各地散播一系列教育宣传材料——甚至是其他国家——以期取得足够的社会认可。其中部分及相关资料摘录如下。 [...]
> 
> //-- 节选自“行动：目击公开材料”，作者Alice Sharp，发表于揭开面纱杂志(2049)//

= **[[size larger]]行动：目击公开材料[[/size]]**

-----
[[=image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:public-release-of-operation-witness-materials/poster1.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**相关资料：** [# “隐形战争”或：真实世界如何原形毕露 (翔鸾报，2022-2024)]//[[footnote]]图文：看不见什么？说点什么！不可见的异常导致了36%的超自然犯罪事件。[[/footnote]]

-----
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:public-release-of-operation-witness-materials/poster5.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**相关资料：** [[[another-goddamn-magic-system|Tilda Moose教授的魔法自卫指南讲稿抄录(先锋会学术团体，2026)]]]//[[footnote]]图文：当面对奇术超自然犯罪时，记住：1.逃离其直接影响区域 2.通知适当的GOC部门 3.收集其所有咒语信息 4.阻止他们前进 5.尽可能平息（疑似tranquilize的错字）所有奇术反应。[[/footnote]]

-----
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:public-release-of-operation-witness-materials/poster6.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**相关资料：** [# 非现实居住区的诸多危险(Micheals-Reynders大学，2031)]//[[footnote]]图文：头昏眼花？这是当地现实不稳定的症状之一。请致电联盟专家检查您当地的现实。[[/footnote]]

-----
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:public-release-of-operation-witness-materials/poster4.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**相关资料：** [[[vikander-kneed-worldwide-news-network|营销中的模因恐怖主义和认知危害，出自Vikander-Kneed技术媒体的指导讲座 (佚名，2035)]]]//[[footnote]]图文：当心：...会杀死你。接种你今日的模因疫苗。[[/footnote]]

-----
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:public-release-of-operation-witness-materials/poster2.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**相关资料：** [# 奥伯龙王国，第四次起义，以及21世纪后精灵独立的崛起(希神议会，2040)]//[[footnote]]图文：2023年，先锋会官方声明，SCP基金会的主要前身对75%的智慧精灵族犯下了种族屠杀的罪行。只需考虑片刻。[[/footnote]]

-----
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:public-release-of-operation-witness-materials/poster8.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**相关资料：** [[[the-first-occult-flame-war|超自然喷子和你：给忧心如焚的父母们的指南 (全球超自然联盟，2043)]]]//[[footnote]]图文：并非所有种类的大麻都合法。趁现在还有机会，将其中一些连根拔除。密切关注您孩子常逛的网站。[[/footnote]]

-----
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:public-release-of-operation-witness-materials/poster3.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**相关资料：** [# KTE-9817-Bluebuster-Mendel-Shelley-Renegade-Armbrusteri全球大流行的传染病学报告 (世界超自然卫生组织，2048)]//[[footnote]]图文：若在奇术使用过程中缺乏能量、欲望、创造性，以及遇到困难，也许是您的身体EVE产生过低所致。这是美国抗奇术病毒的典型症状。请向当地世界超自然卫生组织报告以检查风险性。[[/footnote]]

-----
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:public-release-of-operation-witness-materials/poster7.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**相关资料：** [# 案例文件#182-GFDS/G97：梦神集团的倒闭及对全球梦境圈的震荡 (国际超自然法庭，2049)]//[[footnote]]图文：这里是您第一次来！如果您感到一种梦境般的似曾相识，立即向就近世界超自然卫生组织授权诊所报告，以检查梦境脑损伤的迹象。[[/footnote]]

行动：目击公开材料

      // Expose identity for interwikiFrame
      window.isStyleFrame = true;

      // Find interwikiFrames in the parent that have initialised before
      // this styleFrame did, and push the query parameters to it
      Array.prototype.slice.call(parent).forEach(function (frame) {
        try {
          if (frame.isInterwikiFrame) {
            frame.requestStyleChange(location.search);
          }
        } catch (error) {
          // If an interwikiFrame in the parent isn't ready to receive a style
          // change request, that's fine - it will pull the style from this
          // styleFrame when it's ready
          if (!(error instanceof DOMException)) {
            // All other errors must be reported
            throw error;
          }
        }

旧作









What this is
A bunch of miscellaneous CSS 'improvements' that I, Croquembouche, use on a bunch of pages because I think it makes them easier to deal with.
The changes this component makes are bunch of really trivial modifications to ease the writing experience and to make documenting components/themes a bit easier (which I do a lot). It doesn't change anything about the page visually for the reader — the changes are for the writer.
I wouldn't expect translations of articles that use this component to also use this component, unless the translator likes it and would want to use it anyway.
This component probably won't conflict with other components or themes, and even if it does, it probably won't matter too much.
Usage
On any wiki:

This component is designed to be used on other components. When using on another component, be sure to add this inside the component's [[iftags]] block, so that users of your component are not forced into also using Croqstyle.
Related components
Other personal styling components (which change just a couple things):

RSO Component — Rounderhouse

Personal styling themes (which are visual overhauls):

Magnus Web Format — DrMagnus
Flopstyle CSS — Lt Flops
Blankstyle CSS — HarryBlank
Placestyle CSS — Placeholder McD
Jakstyle — JakdragonX


CSS changes
Reasonably-sized footnotes
Stops footnotes from being a million miles wide, so that you can actually read them.

Monospace edit/code
Makes the edit textbox monospace, and also changes all monospace text to Fira Code, the obviously superior monospace font.

Teletype backgrounds
Adds a light grey background to <tt> elements ({{text}}), so code snippets stand out more.

No more bigfaces
Stops big pictures from appearing when you hover over someone's avatar image, because they're stupid and really annoying and you can just click on them if you want to see the big version.

Breaky breaky
Any text inside a div with class nobreak has line-wrapping happen between every letter.

Code colours
Add my terminal's code colours as variables. Maybe I'll change this to a more common terminal theme like Monokai or something at some point, but for now it's just my personal theme, which is derived from Tomorrow Night Eighties.
Also, adding the .terminal class to a fake code block as [[div class="code terminal"]] gives it a sort of pseudo-terminal look with a dark background. Doesn't work with [[code]], because Wikidot inserts a bunch of syntax highlighting that you can't change yourself without a bunch of CSS. Use it for non-[[code]] code snippets only.
Quick tool to colourise a 'standard' Wikidot component usage example with the above vars: link


Debug mode
Draw lines around anything inside .debug-mode. The colour of the lines is red but defers to CSS variable --debug-colour.
You can also add div.debug-info.over and div.debug-info.under inside an element to annotate the debug boxes — though you'll need to make sure to leave enough vertical space that the annotation doesn't overlap the thing above or below it.

> [...] **行动：目击**由五角大楼/北美全球超自然然联盟长期联合发起，致力于平息[[[from-120-s-archives-hub|“面纱协议”]]][[[no-return-hub|2021年全球大崩溃]]]。在这一行动的指导下，一系列社会活动纷至沓来，旨在将美国公众引向一个怪异——且有几份骇人的——新世界。

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:license-box-end]]","textContent":"设定中心 » 120站档案馆 中心页 / 无悔之道 中心页 » 行动：目击公开材料







 

[…] 行动：目击由五角大楼/北美全球超自然然联盟长期联合发起，致力于平息“面纱协议”2021年全球大崩溃。在这一行动的指导下，一系列社会活动纷至沓来，旨在将美国公众引向一个怪异——且有几份骇人的——新世界。
为了在与先锋会的“舆论之战”中大获全胜，它陆续在全美各地散播一系列教育宣传材料——甚至是其他国家——以期取得足够的社会认可。其中部分及相关资料摘录如下。 […]
— 节选自“行动：目击公开材料”，作者Alice Sharp，发表于揭开面纱杂志(2049)

 
 

行动：目击公开材料



相关资料： “隐形战争”或：真实世界如何原形毕露 (翔鸾报，2022-2024)1



相关资料： Tilda Moose教授的魔法自卫指南讲稿抄录(先锋会学术团体，2026)2



相关资料： 非现实居住区的诸多危险(Micheals-Reynders大学，2031)3



相关资料： 营销中的模因恐怖主义和认知危害，出自Vikander-Kneed技术媒体的指导讲座 (佚名，2035)4



相关资料： 奥伯龙王国，第四次起义，以及21世纪后精灵独立的崛起(希神议会，2040)5



相关资料： 超自然喷子和你：给忧心如焚的父母们的指南 (全球超自然联盟，2043)6
